name: Monsurate.github.io
body:
### Welcome to rajivmonsurate.com.
Greetings! I'm a freelance software developer. If you would like to work with me, please [let me know](mailto: admin@rajivmonsurate.com).

## Application Development
I can help you build software for desktop (Windows), mobile (Android) or web/cloud environments.

## Publishing
I consult on TeX/LaTeX based solutions, workflows and tools for companies providing pre-press services. I have created TeX macros, LaTeX class files and accompanying documentation for various publishers to use as author templates. I have also supported authors with technical advice in the process of writing and submitting their manuscripts.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
